explains: adj. 耗时的；旷日持久的

sentences.en: Americans are willing to tolerate time-consuming security procedures in return for increased safety.
sentences.cn: 美国人愿意忍受耗时的安全程序，来换取更高的安全性。

sentences.en: The complaints procedure is clumsy and time-consuming.
Going to court can be an expensive, time-consuming, and gut-wrenching experience that is best avoided.
sentences.cn: 上法庭会是种费钱，费时间，并带来精神痛苦的经历，最好能加以避免。
